modules.label: Past Weather for Christchurch Airport as Christchurch Central has no past weather data
modules.name: past-weather

notes.heading: Peak wind gust
notes.text: The direction and speed of the highest gust that was recorded in the hour ended at the time shown.

notes.heading: Temperature
notes.text: The temperature recorded at the time shown.

notes.heading: Rainfall
notes.text: The total rainfall that fell in the hour ended at the time shown.

notes.heading: Peak wind gust
notes.text: The direction and speed of the highest gust that was recorded on the calendar day.

notes.heading: Temperature
notes.text: The highest and lowest temperatures that were recorded on the calendar day.

notes.heading: Rainfall
notes.text: The total rainfall that fell during the calendar day.
The shade of the bar indicates the year or historical average.

notes.heading: Temperature
notes.text: The historical data is the extreme maximum air temperature for the month averaged over a historical period (e.g. 10 years) and the extreme minimum air temperature for the month averaged over a historical period. The data for the previous two years is the highest maximum and lowest minimum recorded for the month.

notes.heading: Rainfall
notes.text: The total rainfall that fell during the month

metadata.author: MetService
metadata.description: Christchurch Central past weather information for yesterday, last 30 days and historical data including rainfall, temperature and peak wind gust. MetService is New Zealand’s national weather authority, providing accurate town, city and rural forecasts across the country.

metadata.title: Christchurch Central Past Weather Observations - MetService New Zealand
